presentation_title: McTycoon: The Golden Arches Game Pitch Deck

title_slide.title: McTycoon: Build and Manage Your Golden Arches Empire

slides.title: The Global Opportunity
slides.body:
• The simulation genre is a $10B+ global market
• 93% of the world recognizes the Golden Arches brand
• Nostalgia for classic tycoon games is at an all-time high
slides.image_prompt: A stylized 3D globe with glowing golden arches popping up in major cities like New York, Tokyo, and London. Professional, clean design.

slides.title: Introducing McTycoon
slides.body: The ultimate restaurant tycoon game, officially licensed by McDonald's. Design your restaurant, manage staff, craft the perfect menu, and delight customers to build a fast-food empire.
slides.image_prompt: Vibrant, isometric 3D concept art of a bustling, customized McDonald's restaurant filled with happy customers. Shows a PlayPlace and a modern interior.

slides.title: Core Gameplay Loop
slides.body:
• Design & Build - Customize every detail from floor tiles to kitchen layout
• Manage & Train - Hire staff, set schedules, and unlock new skills
• Serve & Grow - Fulfill orders, master the menu, and expand your franchise

slides.title: Unleash Your Creativity
slides.body: Build the restaurant of your dreams. From retro 80s themes to futuristic automated kitchens, the only limit is your imagination.
slides.image_prompt: A split-screen in-game screenshot. One side shows a vintage McDonald's with red and white tiles. The other shows a hyper-modern McCafe with sleek, minimalist design.

slides.title: Our Unique Value
slides.body:
• The only official McDonald's management simulation game
• Deep customization engine for endless replayability
• Fun, chaotic 'McMischief' events featuring iconic characters
slides.image_prompt: A humorous in-game scene where the character Grimace has accidentally spilled a giant purple shake, creating a fun challenge for the player's staff to clean up.

slides.title: Market Landscape
slides.body:
• RollerCoaster Tycoon (Atari) - Classic IP but struggles on mobile | Our advantage: Mobile-first design and a far larger, global brand.
• Cooking Fever (Nordcurrent) - 400M+ downloads but simple mechanics | Our advantage: Deep simulation and strategic management gameplay.
• Planet Coaster (Frontier) - Critically acclaimed but PC-only | Our advantage: Accessible to a massive casual mobile audience.

slides.title: Business Model
slides.body:
A free-to-play model with a focus on ethical monetization.
• Starter Packs - Bundles for new players
• Cosmetic IAPs - Special restaurant themes and staff outfits
• Expansion Packs - McCafé, PlayPlace, and international menu add-ons
slides.image_prompt: A clean, friendly UI of the in-game store, showcasing cosmetic items like a 'Retro 90s Theme Pack' and a 'Future Forward Uniform Set'.

slides.title: Meet The Team
slides.body:
• Anya Sharma, CEO - Former Senior Producer on The Sims Mobile at EA
• Ben Carter, CPO - Lead Game Designer at King, managed Candy Crush Saga
• Chloe Davis, CTO - Ex-Zynga lead engineer, built scalable backend for FarmVille 3
• Marcus Adebayo, Art Director - Concept artist for Disney and DreamWorks animation

slides.title: Our Player Personas
slides.body:
• The Strategist - Loves optimizing layouts for maximum efficiency
• The Decorator - Spends hours creating the perfect restaurant aesthetic
• The Nostalgist - Wants to recreate the McDonald's of their childhood
slides.image_prompt: A collage of three distinct, stylish portraits representing different player types: a focused young man, a creative woman, and a smiling older person.

slides.title: The Ask
slides.body:
We are raising a $2.5M seed round to achieve launch.
• 40% - Team & Development
• 35% - IP Licensing & Marketing
• 25% - Operations & Platform Fees
slides.image_prompt: A clean, modern pie chart visualizing the 'Use of Funds' breakdown with corresponding icons for development, marketing, and operations. Use the brand palette.

slides.title: Our Future Vision
slides.body: To become the global leader in branded simulation games, expanding with new iconic partners and creating a platform for beloved brands to engage with fans in a fun, interactive way.
